description:
After being interrogated, Kuro escapes her confinement to Luvia`s house and for some reason starts boldly seducing Shirou in Illya`s living room. Truly sacrificing herself, Illya tries to put a stop to Kuro. Then, after noticing Kuro`s escape, Rin and Luvia barge in with Miyu in tow?!
Source: crunchyroll
